thread.title: Chemical weapons experts finally have Syria samples

title: Chemical weapons experts finally have Syria samples

organizations.name: organisation for the prohibition of chemical weapons

text:
Chemical weapons experts finally have Syria samples 6:02pm BST - 01:22 
A team of inspectors from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) visited a site in Douma, Syria on Saturday to collect samples as it tries to determine whether such weapons were used there on April 7.   
A team of inspectors from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) visited a site in Douma, Syria on Saturday to collect samples as it tries to determine whether such weapons were used there on April 7.  //reut.rs/2K3TkwU
